lead_paragraph: FRANCIS--Joseph H.,95, February 5, 2016 of Hastings-on-Hudson, NY and St. Petersburg, Florida. Beloved husband of Ada and Rose (August 20, 1997); father of Jo (John Fuegi), Barb (Keith O'Neal), Judi (Roy Sloane), Louise (Dennis Cusack), Paul (Joan Nielsen), Kerry (Chris Dunne); stepfather to Diane Capezzera (Mike), Gregory Piacente (Lucinda); thirteen grandchildren, seven and one half great-grandchildren. BS, Fordham University, 1940, where he also studied law. Twice decorated in WWII in the largest-ever naval battle at Leyte Gulf. At 23, personally congratulated by Secretary of War Henry Stimson for winning an artillery competition against the British on Cape Cod. Legislative tax executive at Texaco and J.C. Penney. Led Reformed Church of Hastings consistory and was longtime trustee. In retirement, guest editor, St. Petersburg Times, where he advocated the importance of taxes to our democracy. Sine pari. 1/3
